meanings.definition: To surpass in learning or knowledge.
meanings.sent1: Sarah outlearns her classmates in math.
meanings.sent2: He always outlearns his siblings when it comes to history.
meanings.sent3: The young student outlearns the wise old teacher in a surprising turn of events.
meanings.sent4: Her curiosity outlearns any obstacle in her path to knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The eager learner outlearns everyone in the room, leaving them in awe.

meanings.definition: To learn more than someone else.
meanings.sent1: The diligent student outlearns his lazy friend.
meanings.sent2: She outlearns her peers by studying every day.
meanings.sent3: The cat outlearns the dog in a race to learn new tricks.
meanings.sent4: His determination outlearns any challenge that comes his way.
meanings.sent5: The young scientist outlearns her mentors with her innovative ideas.
